import React, { useState } from 'react' import Image from '../../Components/UI/Images/Image' import SubmitButton from '../../Components/UI/Button/Button' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' const Login = () => { const[user,setUser]=useState({}); const {register, handleSubmit, errors} = useForm({ mode:"onTouched" }); const onSubmit = (data)=>{ setUser(data) console.log(user); } return (

Welcome Back

Please use the account you have been given to log in

{errors.email?.message}

{errors.password?.message}

Login

Forgot Password?

) } export default Login
